text: awlm ytfkr hwla' almkdhdhibwn birusul allah waliqayih fi khalaq allah 'iyahm, wa'anah khlqhm, walam yakunuu shyyana. ma khalaq allah alsmwat wal'ard wama baynahuma 'iilaa li'iiqamat aleadl walthwab waleqab, waldlalt ealaa twhydh wqdrth, wa'ajal musamana tantahi 'iilayh wahu yawm alqyam? wa'iina kthyrana min alnaas biliqa' rabihim ljahdwn mnkrwn; jhla minhum bi'ana meadhm 'iilaa allah baed fnayhm, wghfltan minhum ean alakhrt
